::DarkMouse::

She looked up at Quickstrike.  She gave a half a smile for she 
couldn't smile fully yet. She whispered,"thank you commander."
She shook a lttle under the pelt. Her body was still feeling the 
effects of the energon flowing through her body.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> Quickstrike:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Quickstrike stared wide-eyed at Dark Mouse's body layed out on the 
> table. If he had the design, he would gape his mouth. His long 
> multible digits he had on his right hand were spread out. He stared 
> for several moments, speechless. It was a day before when he 
> remembered trying to get her to the CR room when she died on him, 
and 
> now she was alive, talking to Black Arachnia. 
> 
> He slowly walked towards her, his face frozen in a stunned 
> expression. It was almost like seeing a ghost. He stepped to Black 
> Arachnia's side and swiftly turned his head towards her face.
> 
> "Ya did this?" he stammered.
> 
> Just then, he heard Dark Mouse say in a whispering tone that she 
was 
> cold. He immediately snapped into action. "Ah got uh pelt!" he 
> quickly said.
> 
> He bolted out of the room and ran down the corridors to his 
quarters. 
> He nearly slammed into the frame if he hadn't caught himself with 
his 
> multi-digited hand. He bent two long fingers against the side of 
the 
> frame as he caught himself, but he ignored the pain. He dashed over 
> to his bunk, where beneath the foot of it, was the fur pelt Rowdy 
> Wolf gave to him for his trip back to base. He snatched it up and 
ran 
> back to the lab room. He nearly bent his fingers again catching 
> himself at the frame of the doorway. He ran back to the table side, 
> his face still a little wild.
> 
> He threw the fur pelt across Dark Mouse's body.
> 
> "Here," he quickly said. "This better?"
